title: So, has riot decided to postpone Mundo's VGU? He was high priority not long ago...
body:
My apologies if this sounds a bit like a rage fit, but I cannot understand his skin release. He wasn't in high demand for one and champions who have outdated game play and models don't sell skins that well compared to modern champions.

He has the most outdated and ugly model in the game. Looking like a mixture of barney the dinosaur and the hulk that has overdosed on every single drug in existence 1000x above he human safety limit. His new skin really just shows how outdated his model really is.

If its one thing Ive learned about skin releases is that it means it delays a champions VGU by years when looking at the history of skin release dates and champions who got VGU's.

Did riot decide that he was too difficult to update and postpone him for a couple of years? VGU's are always years away from skin releases dates and this has me worried.
